Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Mighty Swarm: Gathered Swarm inflicts 1d8, gives self half cover, or knocks foe prone
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Beguiling Twist: Use Reaction to redirect saved charm or fright effect to different target for 1 min (DC 17 Wis ends)
Dreadful Strikes: Weapon hit does +1d6 HP psychic 1/rd
Favored Foe: Hit on marked foe inflicts +1d8 HP weapon damage for conc or 1 min 6/long rest
Feral Senses: No Disadv vs. invisible foe
Fighting Style (Thrown Weapon Fighting): Draw thrown weapon as part of Attack action, +2 HP weapon damage with thrown weapon
Foe Slayer: +3 attack or damage vs. favored enemy
Gathered Swarm: After a hit, companion swarm moves self 5', moves foe 15' (DC 17 Str neg), or inflicts 1d8 HP piercing
Savage Attacker: Take best of two melee damage rolls 1/tn
Swarming Dispersal: When hit, use Reaction to gain resistance and teleport 30' 6/long rest
Tireless: Self gains 1d8+3 temporary HP 6/long rest, short rest reduces exhaustion by 1
Save Proficiency: Dexterity; Strength

Magic
Spell Slots: D0: 2; R1: 4; R2: 3; R3: 3; R4: 3; R5: 2; W0: 2; W1: 1 Attack: R: 9; W: 7 Spell DC: R: 17; W: 15
Spells:
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 1d8 HP necrotic, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Conjure Woodland Beings (R4 Conj): R60' Summons obedient fey creatures for conc or 1 hr
Cordon Of Arrows (R2 Tran): R5' Four pieces of ammo attack w/in 30', inflict 1d6 HP piercing (Dex neg) for 8 hr
Dominate Beast (R4 Ench): R60' Target obeys self telepathic commands (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min
Ensnaring Strike (R1 Conj): Successful attack restrains foe and inflicts 1d6 HP/tn piercing (Str neg) for conc or 1 min
Entangle (R1 Conj): R90' Growth ensnares creatures in 20' sq (Str neg) for conc or 1 min
Fog Cloud (R1 Conj): R120' 20' radius obscures vision for conc or 1 hr
Greater Restoration (R5 Abju): Touched becomes unexhausted, uncharmed, unpetrified, or uncursed or regains ability or HP
Locate Animals Or Plants (R2 Divi): Self learns location of named beast or plant w/in 5 mile
Longstrider (R1 Tran): Touched gains +10' Speed for 1 hr
Mage Armor (W1 Abju): Touched gains AC 13 + DexMod in no armor for 8 hr
Meld Into Stone (R3 Tran): Self step into rock for 8 hr
Plant Growth (R3 Tran): R150' Overgrows 100' radius or enriches 1/2 mile radius for 1 yr
Ray Of Frost (W0 Evoc): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 1d8 HP cold and -10' Speed for 1 rd
Revivify (R3 Necr): Restores touched 1-minute-old corpse to life w/1 HP
Shillelagh (D0 Tran): Touched club gains +9 attacks, inflicts 1d8 HP for 1 min
Stoneskin (R4 Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for conc or 1 hr
Summon Beast (R2 Conj): R90' Summoned air, land, or water bestial spirit obeys self for conc or 1 hr
Thorn Whip (D0 Tran): R30' Ranged spell inflicts %1d6 HP and pulls 10'
Tree Stride (R5 Conj): Self teleports between like trees 1/rd for conc or 1 min
Magic Notes:
Fighting Style (Druidic Warrior): Know 2 D0 cantrips
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Know 2 W0 spells, cast 1 W1 spell/long rest
Fey Reinforcements: Cast Summon Fey 1/long rest, optionally for 1 min instead of conc, 1/long rest
Fey Wanderer Magic: Access to additional spells
Misty Wanderer: Cast R5' Misty Step targeting self and 1 other 3/long rest
Nature's Veil: Self becomes invisible for 1 rd 6/long rest
Primal Awareness: Cast Speak With Animals, Beast Sense, Speak With Plants, Locate Creature, Commune With Nature 1/long rest
Spellcasting Focus: Use druidic focus for ranger spells
Swarmkeeper Magic: Know Mage Hand cantrip, access to additional spells
